description.narrative: Bel Ga Myanmar Limited (Bel Ga MM or the Company) is an existing IFC client that is engaged in the poultry breeding business in Myanmar with a significant market share in Myanmar. IFC loan will support the expansion of Bel Ga MMs existing hatchery facility and sustain the Companys operations through the COVID-19 market downturn. The proposed financing as detailed below is based on the thesis of (i) committed and financially strong Sponsors; (ii) a well secured loan with Sponsors support arrangements; and (iii) IFC to play an important countercyclical financial support to mitigate the COVID-19 impact. This project follows IFC's initial US$7.5 million investment in Bel Ga Myanmar in 2017 (#38236): https://disclosures.ifc.org/project-detail/SII/38236/bel-ga-myanmar

By sustaining the Company's operations, the project helps to accelerate the 4-party business model that will insulate farmers from short-term price fluctuations during uncertain times. At the market level, the project helps to create a stable market by providing commercial farmers with the necessary fixed inputs, technical support and a fixed offtake at the end of the production cycle.
